Package za.co.luma.math.sampling

The classes in this package is useful for sampling images, although some might be used to sample arbitrary structures.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Sampler<T> Used to sample a collection (or image).
 

Class Summary
PoissonDiskMultiSampler  
PoissonDiskMultiSampler.Circle  
PoissonDiskSampler Algorithm based on Fast Poisson Disk Sampling in Arbitrary Dimensions by Robert Bridson, but with an arbitrary minimum distance function.
UniformPoissonDiskSampler Algorithm based on Fast Poisson Disk Sampling in Arbitrary Dimensions by Robert Bridson.
UniformRandomSampler  
 

Package za.co.luma.math.sampling Description

The classes in this package is useful for sampling images, although some might be used to sample arbitrary structures.
